attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Performer, adventurer, cultural ambassador extrodinaire.  Brian Blessed has surely fulfilled all the requirements for receiving a knighthood several times over.  We request that the PM acknowledge his services to UK culture and finally make him Sir Brian Blessed.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
